name: Space Ship 2
description:
You are stranded in space with the only thing you have is your space ship. Suddenly a flock of alien space ships charges up to you! You must shoot'em up and find your way home!

Control
  • Move with Arrow Keys!
  • Shoot with Space Bar!
Message from developer I'm new to game development so this game will probably lack of quality than other games. That's why it's free so that you can delete the game without any regrets!:D Also I'm trying to improve my skills everyday so suggesting a way to upgrade the quality of my games will be welcomed!(Just don't post mean comments for no reason)
